```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr);
library(dplyr);
library(magrittr);
df <- read_tsv (file = "dpt2015.txt",
locale = locale(encoding = "ISO-8859-1"));
```

```{r}
df;
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2);
df %>% filter(preusuel %in% c("PABLO", "KATHLEEN")) %>% filter(annais!="XXXX") %>% group_by(preusuel, annais) %>% summarize(N=sum(nombre)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=annais, y=N, group=as.factor(preusuel), color=as.factor(preusuel)->Prénoms)) + geom_point() + geom_line();
```
